definitions.definition: A non-interactive network downloader which supports downloading via HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP protocols.
definitions.term_usage_example: To download a file from the internet, you can use the command 'wget http://example.com/file.txt'.

definitions.definition: Un descargador de red no interactivo que admite la descarga a través de los protocolos HTTP, HTTPS y FTP.
definitions.term_usage_example: Para descargar un archivo de internet, puedes usar el comando 'wget http://example.com/file.txt'.
